statements: SELECT * FROM financial_news_articles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT article_title, publish_date FROM financial_news_articles ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT article_id, article_title, sentiment_score FROM financial_news_articles WHERE publish_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_news_articles WHERE sentiment_score BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0;
SELECT article_id, article_content FROM financial_news_articles WHERE article_title LIKE '%market%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT article_id, article_title FROM financial_news_articles WHERE publish_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY publish_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM financial_news_articles WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT article_title, article_content FROM financial_news_articles WHERE article_content LIKE '%stock%' ORDER BY article_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT article_id, article_title, sentiment_score FROM financial_news_articles WHERE publish_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC, publish_date ASC;
SELECT article_title, publish_date FROM financial_news_articles WHERE sentiment_score < 0.2 ORDER BY publish_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT id, title, publish_date FROM financial_news_articles;
SELECT content, sentiment_score FROM financial_news_articles WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis_results WHERE confidence_score > 0.8 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT title, content FROM financial_news_articles WHERE publish_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, sentiment_label, confidence_score FROM financial_news_articles JOIN sentiment_analysis_results ON financial_news_articles.id = sentiment_analysis_results.article_id;
SELECT * FROM financial_news_articles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, publish_date FROM financial_news_articles WHERE publish_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT content FROM financial_news_articles WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT fa.title, sa.sentiment_label, sa.confidence_score FROM financial_news_articles AS fa JOIN sentiment_analysis_results AS sa ON fa.id = sa.article_id WHERE sa.sentiment_label = 'positive';

SELECT fa.title, sa.sentiment_label, sa.confidence_score FROM financial_news_articles AS fa LEFT JOIN sentiment_analysis_results AS sa ON fa.id = sa.article_id WHERE sa.sentiment_label IS NULL ORDER BY fa.publish_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM financial_news WHERE id = 1;
SELECT article_title, publishing_date FROM financial_news WHERE publishing_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT article_title, article_content FROM financial_news WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis ORDER BY analysis_timestamp DESC;
SELECT model_id, model_name FROM nlp_models WHERE model_type = 'NLP';
SELECT id, article_title, article_content, publishing_date FROM financial_news WHERE publishing_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT analysis_id, article_id, sentiment_score, analysis_timestamp FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY analysis_timestamp DESC;
SELECT model_id, model_name, model_type, trained_date FROM nlp_models WHERE trained_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY model_id ASC;
SELECT id, article_title, publishing_date FROM financial_news WHERE article_title LIKE '%market%' ORDER BY publishing_date DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, article_id FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score < 0.2 ORDER BY analysis_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM financial_articles;
SELECT title, author, publish_date FROM financial_articles WHERE publish_date >= '2022-01-01' AND publish_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT article_id, content FROM financial_articles WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT model_name, accuracy FROM nlp_models ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT COUNT(article_id) AS total_articles FROM financial_articles;
SELECT * FROM financial_articles;
SELECT title, content FROM financial_articles WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT article_id, publish_date, sentiment_score FROM financial_articles ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT title, sentiment_type, confidence_level FROM financial_articles JOIN article_sentiments ON financial_articles.article_id = article_sentiments.article_id WHERE sentiment_type = 'positive';
SELECT model_name, model_description, accuracy FROM nlp_models WHERE accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM Financial_News_Articles;
SELECT article_title, publish_date FROM Financial_News_Articles WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT article_title, source_name FROM Financial_News_Articles JOIN Article_Sources ON Financial_News_Articles.article_id = Article_Sources.source_id;

SELECT article_title, sentiment_label FROM Financial_News_Articles JOIN Sentiment_Analysis_Results ON Financial_News_Articles.article_id = Sentiment_Analysis_Results.article_id ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Article_Authors WHERE author_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT article_title, publish_date FROM Financial_News_Articles WHERE sentiment_score > 0.6;
SELECT * FROM Financial_News_Articles WHERE publish_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT article_title, author_name, tag_name FROM Financial_News_Articles JOIN Article_Authors ON Financial_News_Articles.article_id = Article_Authors.author_id JOIN Article_Tags ON Financial_News_Articles.article_id = Article_Tags.tag_id;

SELECT article_title, sentiment_label FROM Financial_News_Articles JOIN Sentiment_Analysis_Results ON Financial_News_Articles.article_id = Sentiment_Analysis_Results.article_id WHERE Sentiment_Analysis_Results.confidence_score > 0.8;

SELECT DISTINCT source_name, source_type FROM Financial_News_Articles JOIN Article_Sources ON Financial_News_Articles.article_id = Article_Sources.source_id WHERE Article_Sources.source_type = 'Online';
